title: dogetwit
author: dogetwit
content: What is DogeTwit?DogeTwit is the first project of the Dogecoin ecosystem built on the BSC (Binance Smart Chain).DogeTwit is a combination of Dogecoin and Twitter: Dogeverse, building a social network that allows users to share memes and GIFs on the metaverse.  To help users easily create and share content, DogeTwit integrates meme creation and NFT marketplace.  Platform users can earn rewards such as native tokens or receive NFT items.In addition, DogeTwit is also an NFT social network channel with outstanding features:• NFT Native Forum (Crypto Forum; NFT): DogeTwit provides a forum where anyone can participate in discussion and exchange about the project by logging into the system.• On-chain Governance: DogeTwit will provide lists of governance contracts, administrators can vote on proposed changes (on-chain).• Chat (Chat): DogeTwit is the first crypto, NFT chat application for community management, the feature was launched to serve the needs of chatting, discussing, ... of participants. In addition, there are some other features such as:• Templates for posts in the general community, similar to the status interface on Facebook.• Delegating Votes is a poll before or after an administrative vote.  Similar to Telegram, DogeTwit will have an Admin & Mod to manage and control the bad cases.Benefits of Holding DogeTwit (DTW)When holding DogeTwit Token, users will enjoy the following benefits:- Contribute to project governance by staking DTW.- Participate in creating liquidity and receive NFT rewards.- Join the Dogeverse.- Get periodic rewards, split profits on Dogeverse.
